Uses of Interface
ray.rage.scene.Entity

  • Packages that use Entity 
    Package Description
    ray.rage.scene  
    ray.rage.scene.generic  

    • Uses of Entity in ray.rage.scene

      Subinterfaces of Entity in ray.rage.scene 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SkeletalEntity
      A Skeletal Entity extends the notion of an Entity to add support for Skeletal animations using a skeleton, and a mesh.
      Methods in ray.rage.scene that return Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Entity SceneManager.createEntity(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String meshPath)
      Creates a new entity with the specified name based on the mesh at the specified file system path.
      Entity SceneManager.getEntity(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the entity with the specified name, if it exists.
      Entity SubEntity.getParent()
      Gets the parent entity of this sub-entity
      Methods in ray.rage.scene that return types with arguments of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Iterable<Entity> SceneManager.getEntities()
      Lets the caller iterate over all the entities owned by this manager.
      Methods in ray.rage.scene with parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SceneManager.destroyEntity(Entity e)
      Destroys the entity by the specified name, if it exists.
